hero.title: Thola
hero.subtitle: Thola okhokho bakho, xhuma lezihlobo, futhi ulondoloze ifa lomndeni wakho ngeplatform yesimo esiphezulu emhlabeni yokulandela usendo.

features.title: Amathuluzi Anamandla Okuthola Umndeni
features.subtitle: Konke okudingayo ukuthola, ukulondoloza, nokwabelana ngomlando womndeni wakho

interactiveFamilyTrees.title: Izihlahla Zomndeni Ezisebenzisanayo
interactiveFamilyTrees.description: Yakha futhi uhlole umlando womndeni wakho ngethuluzi lethu elikulula lokudonsa-nokubeka lesihlahla somndeni.

dnaMatching.title: Ukufanisa kwe-DNA
dnaMatching.description: Thola izihlobo nemvelaphi yohlanga ngokuhlaziya kwe-DNA okuthuthukile kanye nama-algorithms okufanisa.

historicalRecords.title: Amarekhodi Omlando
historicalRecords.description: Sesha kumazigidi amarekhodi omlando, amadokhumenti, nezindlu zogcino emhlabeni wonke.

photoEnhancement.title: Ukwenza Izithombe Zibe Ngcono
photoEnhancement.description: Buyisela, fakela imibala, futhi wenze izithombe ezindala zomndeni zibe ngcono usebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obusekelwe ku-AI.

collaborativeResearch.title: Ucwaningo Olubambisanayo
collaborativeResearch.description: Sebenza ndawonye namalungu omndeni nabanye abacwaningi ukuthola umlando wenu ohlanganyelwe.

globalDatabase.title: Isizinda Sedatha Somhlaba
globalDatabase.description: Finyelela amarekhodi avela emhlabeni wonke ngesizinda sethu esiphelele sedatha yosendo.

testimonials.title: Kuthenjwe Yizigidi
testimonials.subtitle: Bona lokho okushiwo umphakathi wethu ngeDzinza

testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: I-Dzinza yangisiza ngilandele umndeni wami ukubuyela ezizukulwaneni eziyishumi nambili. Isici sokufanisa kwe-DNA sangikhongolose nezimpawu engingazazanga ukuthi zikhona!

testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.content: Ukusesha amarekhodi omlando kunamandla amangalisayo. Ngathola amadokhumenti okufuduka ogogo wami ngaphakathi kwemizuzu.

testimonial3.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: Isici sokubuyisela izithombe sabuyisela izithombe zethu ezindala zomndeni ekuphileni. Ugogo wami wamangala ukubona abazali bakhe ngemibala!

cta.title: Ulungele Ukuthola Umlando Womndeni Wakho?
cta.subtitle: Joyina izigidi zabantu abavele baqale uhambo lwabo lomlando womndeni
